title: Governors group skips White House meeting after Trump refused to invite two Democrats
desc: The National Governors Association is pulling out of an annual meeting at the White House after President Donald Trump declined to invite two Democratic governors, undercutting one of Washington's few remaining bipartisan gatherings.

title: Genesis Owusu Celebrates Ghana on New Single 'STAMPEDE'
desc: Music, Film, TV and Political News Coverage

title: Amanda Nunes responds to Sean Strickland’s sexist comments: ‘Don’t cry, man’
desc: Amanda Nunes fired back at Sean Strickland’s anti-WMMA tirade

title: Arsenal or Man City? AI predicts who will win 2025
desc: Sports Mole asks AI to simulate the rest of the 2025-26 Premier League season to determine whether Arsenal or Manchester City will win the title.

title: Commentary: Sluggish Indonesia market clouds aviation outlook for Southeast Asia
desc: A large contraction in domestic air travel within Indonesia will impact the regional outlook in Southeast Asia, says aviation analyst Brendan Sobie.

title: 'No budget, so no choice': Coffee shop toilet grant sees mixed response amid cash flow, space concerns
desc: Despite hefty subsidies, some coffee shop operators remain hesitant about upgrading their toilets, citing the need to pay contractors first and the wait for reimbursement.

title: It seems Microsoft just started work on Windows 11 27H2 - and this could be the update that saves the OS... or dooms it
desc: We're seeing multiple signs that work on fixing the fundamentals of Windows 11 has begun

title: Britain's Andrew hands back Norwegian royal order, Norwegian palace says
desc: King Charles' younger brother Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor has given back a royal Norwegian order that the former prince received almost four decades ago, Norway's palace said on Thursday.

title: Scientists measure air pollution from reentering SpaceX rocket in real-time: 'It's never been done before'
desc: For the first time ever, scientists have observed in near real time a cloud of air pollution created as a SpaceX rocket burned up in Earth's atmosphere.

title: Researchers Confirm 2025 Signature Conjecture Using Dedekind Sums
desc: Researchers have mathematically confirmed a long-standing conjecture regarding the signature of a specific topological quantum field theory for complex surfaces, utilising novel calculations based on generalised Dedekind sums and their connection to Eichler integrals.
